titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the years for carryback of net operating losses for certain farm losses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/14/1998--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase, for a limited period of time, from two to ten the number of years permitted for the carryback of net operating losses for certain farmers. Defines specified terms, including "farming loss."
